title: The best way to beat Australia is to wipe the smile off their faces
text:
If England do not win this quarter-final, I think it should be counted as one of their worst losses to Australia – possibly even more humbling than the 76-0 defeat in Brisbane 21 years ago on what became known as the “Tour of Hell”.

That is because nobody, not even Australia’s back-room staff, knows what their best team is. When you are in that situation, it is very tough to win a World Cup.

Australia have a hugely talented group of players and they are relatively well coached, perhaps not the best-coached team in the world but at least they always seem to understand the style of play they are going to adopt in a game ... if not who they should pick.

Their major problem is that they have not...
description: If England do not win this quarter-final, I think it should be counted as one of their worst losses to Australia – possibly even more humbling than the 76-0 defeat in Brisbane 21 years ago on what became known as the “Tour of Hell”.
